name: Config: Unexpected Places
description:
Creating something from a blank file is magic. In my Config 2021 presentation, I take a deep dive into 5 stories of 5 different projects to share how I've used Figma in unexpected ways (and how you can too)!


You can find the files behind each story here:

  • Animal Crossing Character Maker @ bit.ly/figmaAC
  • Collaborative work with IDOT @ bit.ly/figmaChaos
  • Welcome on the Glade with Blueprint @ bit.ly/figmaGlade
  • The Mystery of Everson Manor @ bit.ly/figmaEscape
  • Figma Decal @ bit.ly/figmadecal


See you at Config!
